channel.title: Rune Nexus 667/704 V2
channel.description:
Rune Nexus 667/704
Jar Download: [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/ezbyn985la86/Rune_Nexus.jar"]RuneNexus.com/client.jar[/URL]
- 24/7 - 100% Uptime - Great staff and community - Great staff and community - Stable Economy - Perfect hit formula for melee, range and magic - 138 combat - Working Flowers and Dicing - Constant Updates
----Minigames---- - Fight Caves - Clan Wars - Castle Wars
----Bossing---- - New Bosss - New Godwars (Zaros, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin) - Nex - Corp - And many more
----Skilling---- - All 24 Skills Working 100%! - Custom Dungeoneering! - Working Slayer - Working Hunter!
----Some Other Features---- - Professional and active Staff - Old Runescape Armor - DonatorZone (with shops) - Various shops. - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Bork - Tormented Demons
New Home [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/igj1ty.jpg[/img]
Frost Dragons [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2po8e49.jpg[/img]
Pk Shop [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/k9gzh5.jpg[/img]
DUNG [IMG]http://gyazo.com/59a0cd31f70fa12335f787fad928165a.png?1352864023[/img]
The Kendal (Boss) [IMG]http://gyazo.com/44b40fa535305826ed28b64c40e220f1.png?1352864973[/img]
Pictures are from my DestructionX server, Changed name.
